trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: Azione trigger che avvia un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> e distribuisce le animazioni a proprietà e gli oggetti di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Use a BeginStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un'azione BeginStoryboard con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>per applicare le animazioni alle proprietà di destinazione e avviarli.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: BeginStoryboard begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: BeginStoryboard inizia un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>nel relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>fare riferimento quando attivato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of BeginStoryboard determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: Quando si inizia un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>su una proprietà che è già animata da un altro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>proprietà di BeginStoryboard determina come procede l'animazione.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: Sospendere, riprendere, arresto o in caso contrario controllo un Storyboard in modo interattivo per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>che è stato dichiarato nel markup in modo interattivo, è necessario impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>proprietà del relativo BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) per controllarlo facendo riferimento al relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of BeginStoryboard is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>di BeginStoryboard è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Nel codice, è possibile utilizzare i metodi interattivi della <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>classe per controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>che è stato applicato usando un BeginStoryboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the BeginStoryboard a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: Come accade quando si utilizza <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>oggetti, è necessario assegnare un nome per il BeginStoryboard relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>essere controllabile interattivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il comportamento corretto consegna per avviare un orologio dell'animazione in questo storyboard.

trans-unit.source: ## Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: ##Utilizzando il HandoffBehavior comporre quando si applica un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>a una proprietà tramite <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>gli oggetti precedentemente associati a tale proprietà continueranno a utilizzare le risorse di sistema, il sistema di temporizzazione non rimuove automaticamente questi orologi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare problemi di prestazioni quando si applica un numero elevato di clock utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, è necessario rimuovere clock di composizione dalla proprietà animata dopo il completamento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diversi modi per rimuovere un orologio:: per rimuovere tutti gli orologi da una proprietà, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metodo dell'oggetto animato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Specificare la proprietà viene aggiunta un'animazione come primo parametro, e `null` come il secondo.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione rimuoverà tutti gli orologi di animazione della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere un specifico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>da un elenco di clock, utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>proprietà di una di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>recuperare un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>quindi chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metodo di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene in genere il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>gestore eventi per un orologio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che solo i clock radice possono essere controllati da un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>restituisce proprietà di un orologio figlio `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento non viene chiamato se la durata effettiva dell'orologio è infinita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, l'utente deve determinare quando chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta principalmente di un problema per le animazioni su oggetti che hanno una lunga durata.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando un oggetto viene sottoposto a garbage collection, anche i clock vengono disconnessi e raccolti nel Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti clock, vedere [animazione e temporizzazione System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: Assegnando il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> oggetto, il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> può essere controllato dopo l'avvio.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the Name property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: Per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare in modo interattivo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, impostare la proprietà Name del relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>dell'oggetto come <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>per fare riferimento a questo nome.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the Name of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Se il nome di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>non possono essere interessate in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio; inoltre, quando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>termina o immette il periodo di riempimento, il clock di animazione vengono eliminati.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> viene avviato.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> che il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> viene avviato.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
